verses.text: And it came to pass on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* had \w fully|strong="H3615"\w* set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and had \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* it, and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* it, and all the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, both the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, and had \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* them, and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* them;

That the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, who \add were\add* the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*, and were \w over|strong="H5975"\w* them that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, \w offered|strong="H7126"\w*:\f + \fr 7.2 \ft and were: Heb. who stood\f*

And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* their \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w covered|strong="H6632"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w*, and \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*; a \w wagon|strong="H5699"\w* for \w two|strong="H8147"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*, and for each \w one|strong="H0259"\w* an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*: and they \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* of them, that they may be to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*; and thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, to every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to his \w service|strong="H5656"\w*.
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* and the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.

\w Two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*:

And \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, \w according|strong="H6310"\w* unto their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

But unto the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w*: because the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* belonging unto them \add was that\add* they should \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* upon their \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w*.

¶ And the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* for \w dedicating|strong="H2598"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that it was \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w*, even the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* their \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, They shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* their \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, \w each|strong="H0259"\w* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* on his \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, for the \w dedicating|strong="H2598"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

¶ And he that \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* was \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*:

And his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w charger|strong="H7086"\w*, the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* thereof \add was\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w bowl|strong="H4219"\w* of \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \add were\add* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w spoon|strong="H3709"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*:

And for a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*.

¶ On the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zuar|strong="H6686"\w*, \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, did \w offer|strong="H7126"\w*:

He \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \add for\add* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w charger|strong="H7086"\w*, the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* whereof \add was\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w bowl|strong="H4219"\w* of \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w spoon|strong="H3709"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*:

And for a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zuar|strong="H6686"\w*.

¶ On the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Helon|strong="H2497"\w*, \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \add did offer:\add*

His \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w charger|strong="H7086"\w*, the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* whereof \add was\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w bowl|strong="H4219"\w* of \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w spoon|strong="H3709"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*:

And for a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Helon|strong="H2497"\w*.

¶ On the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Elizur|strong="H0468"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shedeur|strong="H7707"\w*, \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \add did offer:\add*

His \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w charger|strong="H7086"\w* of the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w bowl|strong="H4219"\w* of \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w spoon|strong="H3709"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*:

And for a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of \w Elizur|strong="H0468"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shedeur|strong="H7707"\w*.

¶ On the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Shelumiel|strong="H8017"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zurishaddai|strong="H6701"\w*, \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \add did offer:\add*

His \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w charger|strong="H7086"\w*, the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* whereof \add was\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w bowl|strong="H4219"\w* of \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w spoon|strong="H3709"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*:

And for a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of \w Shelumiel|strong="H8017"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zurishaddai|strong="H6701"\w*.

¶ On the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Eliasaph|strong="H0460"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Deuel|strong="H1845"\w*, \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \add offered:\add*

His \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w charger|strong="H7086"\w* of the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add shekels\add*, a \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w bowl|strong="H4219"\w* of \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w spoon|strong="H3709"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*:

And for a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of \w Eliasaph|strong="H0460"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Deuel|strong="H1845"\w*.

¶ On the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w*, \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \add offered:\add*

His \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w charger|strong="H7086"\w*, the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* whereof \add was\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w bowl|strong="H4219"\w* of \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w spoon|strong="H3709"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \add shekels\add*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:
\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*:
